guide.introduction:
In this tutorial, you will learn step by step, how to make free calls and text messages to any phone in the United States. This will not cost any money, and is completely legal!

This isn't like Skype, where its free only for users.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this tutorial, you will learn step by step, how to make free calls and text messages to any phone in the United States. This will not cost any money, and is completely legal!

This isn't like Skype, where its free only for users.

lines.text: First of all, you will need an ipod touch, iphone or ipad with a microphone(for calling).
lines.text_raw: First of all, you will need an ipod touch, iphone or ipad with a microphone(for calling).

lines.text: Next, you will need to go to the app store. Search for an app called Google Voice. Download it.
lines.text_raw: Next, you will need to go to the app store. Search for an app called Google Voice. Download it.

lines.text: Once it is downloaded, you will need to open it. It will ask you to make a google account(these are free).
lines.text_raw: Once it is downloaded, you will need to open it. It will ask you to make a google account(these are free).

lines.text: Then you will choose you phone number and other options.
lines.text_raw: Then you will choose you phone number and other options.

lines.text: Now you can  send texts or calls to anyone in the U.S. for FREE!
lines.text_raw: Now you can  send texts or calls to anyone in the U.S. for FREE!

guide.summary: Use Google Voice to make completely FREE calls to any other phone in the U.S.
